divs: Sighting Detailsi was in a car on the front seat it was about 4 and i looked up to the sky and saw a small tiny metalic sphere i thought it was an add ballon but it was way to high up even for a weather ballon it was a clear cloudless day and it slowly hoverd south east and then slowly dissolved in to nothing.
Summary: it was small metalic hovering in the sky
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Elgin
There were no other sightings in Elgin on or around August 22nd 2006
